channel.title: Adding Teleports
channel.description:
Hi,
In my Spellbook ingame I have a "Coming Soon..." Teleport, and it takes you no where obviously, but now I want to turn that Teleport into a "Chill Zone" Teleport. How would I do this?
I am using a PI based source and I want the teleport to teleport the player to Coords: 2388, 3487 ....
I will appreciate it to anyone who helps me out.

item.title: Adding Teleports
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

find all instances of ‘Comming Soon’ in your server, or it may be client sided in the interface which would be in RSInterface

Read full topic
